name: Rajarshee Basu

positions.subtitle: Tiger Analytics
positions.description: • Built an AWS infrastructure for web apps and ML pipelines, achieving 15x scalability over the existing solution.• Utilised AWS Batch & EC2 Spot and Metaflow, an automated machine learning pipeline for pricing recommendation engines that can cut operating costs by 40%. • Integrated resilient restart ability solutions along with MlOps code optimisation.• Selected to mentor 5 senior analysts, steering their career development and managing their feedback process
positions.title: MLOps Engineer
positions.description_html:
• Built an AWS infrastructure for web apps and ML pipelines, achieving 15x scalability over the existing solution.
• Utilised AWS Batch & EC2 Spot and Metaflow, an automated machine learning pipeline for pricing recommendation engines that can cut operating costs by 40%.
• Integrated resilient restart ability solutions along with MlOps code optimisation.
• Selected to mentor 5 senior analysts, steering their career development and managing their feedback process

positions.subtitle: Tiger Analytics
positions.description: • Created an end-to-end template using Terraform to create an AWS EKS stack and deploy any docker application.• Designed and developed a web application to streamline deployment activities across various teams.• Used a new could thoroughly, Yandex, to create a MlOps platform and deploy applications.• Delivered training on the diverse technological stack for fostering the professional growth of 20+ new joiners.
positions.title: Senior Analyst - MLOps
positions.description_html:
• Created an end-to-end template using Terraform to create an AWS EKS stack and deploy any docker application.
• Designed and developed a web application to streamline deployment activities across various teams.
• Used a new could thoroughly, Yandex, to create a MlOps platform and deploy applications.
• Delivered training on the diverse technological stack for fostering the professional growth of 20+ new joiners.

positions.subtitle: Tiger Analytics
positions.description: • Deployed dashboard for portal oversight system, real-time metrics, error alerts and performance analytics.• Automated internal user onboarding on AWS and Azure with access management, reducing effort by 30%.• Used tools like Vantage to reduce the cost by 25%.
positions.title: Analyst - MLOps

• Deployed dashboard for portal oversight system, real-time metrics, error alerts and performance analytics.

positions.subtitle: Tiger Analytics
positions.description: • Engineered data-driven insights from three years of telecom data for forecasting customer churns.• Simulated the potential customer churn to secure market dominance with an accuracy of 82%.• Artifacts on each run are stored using MLflow.
positions.title: Intern - MLOps
positions.description_html:
• Engineered data-driven insights from three years of telecom data for forecasting customer churns.
• Simulated the potential customer churn to secure market dominance with an accuracy of 82%.
• Artifacts on each run are stored using MLflow.

experience.title: Database and Android Developer
experience.description: • Collaborated with the development team to design a scalable database schema supporting user profiles, appointment scheduling, and medical history tracking for an Android doctor booking app.• Optimised database structure with indexing and normalisation to ensure high performance and low latency for real-time booking and appointment management.• Integrated security measures and data encryption in the schema, ensuring compliance and protecting user privacy for sensitive patient information.
experience.description_html: • Collaborated with the development team to design a scalable database schema supporting user profiles, appointment scheduling, and medical history tracking for an Android doctor booking app.• Optimised database structure with indexing and normalisation to ensure high performance and low latency for real-time booking and appointment management.• Integrated security measures and data encryption in the schema, ensuring compliance and protecting user privacy for sensitive patient information.

experience.title: Web Developer and Database Designer
experience.description: • Worked on terminal database management for the passenger reservation system and designing and creating databases for Indian Railways.• Developed a web app and optimised database, resulting in an efficiency increase of 40% over the legacy system.• This portal manages all end-points of reservations throughout the country.
experience.description_html: • Worked on terminal database management for the passenger reservation system and designing and creating databases for Indian Railways.• Developed a web app and optimised database, resulting in an efficiency increase of 40% over the legacy system.• This portal manages all end-points of reservations throughout the country. <!---->
